taskDefinition.name: Kinetic Request CE User Create
taskDefinition.author: support@kineticdata.com
taskDefinition.description: Creates a User record in Kinetic Request CE for the specified space.

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Username
parameter.tooltip: The unique username for the user.

parameter.label: Password
parameter.tooltip: The password for this user record.

parameter.label: Space Admin
parameter.tooltip: Should the user have space administration rights. (Yes / No)

parameter.label: Email
parameter.tooltip: The email address for this user record.

parameter.label: Display Name
parameter.tooltip: The display name for this user record.
